name: Collision Chaos
description:
Collision Chaos is a puzzle game where players control a small ball and must navigate through a level by pushing blocks. The levels are designed with various obstacles, so players must use strategic thinking and problem-solving skills to complete each level successfully.

What sets Collision Chaos apart from other puzzle games is its use of AI-generated textures for its graphics. This means that the game has a unique look and feel that is not easily replicated. Additionally, the game's icon is also made using AI technology.

Overall, Collision Chaos provides a challenging and enjoyable gaming experience that is enhanced by its innovative use of AI-generated graphics. It is suitable for players of all ages who enjoy playing puzzle games and are looking for something new and exciting. 

To download first you download the ZIP file then  extract the  file and make a shortcut for the EXE on the desktop.
